snippet: Serena Williams and Maria Sharapova are set to renew their rivalry in the semifinals at the Brisbane International, a key warm-up tournament for the Australian Open.
abstract: Serena Williams and Maria Sharapova are set to renew their rivalry in the semifinals at the Brisbane International, a key warm-up tournament for the Australian Open; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams and Maria Sharapova are set to renew their rivalry in the semifinals at the Brisbane International, a key warm-up tournament for the Australian Open.
